page.title: 19Trade, New Galloway
page.content: New Galloway has 2 general grocer's shops, a Post Office/gift shop, a butcher's shop, an antique shop, a boutique, a garage and a hairdresser's. One can, also, buy coal and bottled gas(there is no piped gas in New Galloway) locally.There are also many self-employed businesses e.g. joiner, architect, solicitor, woodwork sculptor, window cleaner. In fact, all basic needs are catered for. We have a Citizens'Advice Bureau in New Galloway but for Consumer Affairs, one must go to Castle Douglas. For larger or more unusual purchases, one must travel to Castle Douglas/Dumfries or Ayr. The shops, as in many small villages, are, also, meeting places. Shopping can be time consuming but one is compensated by the kindly, personal touch shown to each customer.
